properties.areaDesc: Reno Beach to The Islands OH; Maumee Bay to Reno Beach OH
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 7:14AM EST until January 19 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 knots and waves 3 to 5 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from Maumee Bay to Reno
Beach OH and Lake Erie nearshore waters from Reno Beach to The
Islands OH.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
